ul.li: Create a New Relic Insights API Query Key
Add New Relic Endpoint, Account ID and Insights API Query Key details in 'nrql_connections.conf'

div.pre:
[prod-us-account] apiEndpoint = insights-api.newrelic.com accountId = 1111111 queryKey = y0ur_ins1ghts_qu3ry_k3y_h3re
[test-eu-account] apiEndpoint = insights-api.eu.newrelic.com accountId = 1234567 queryKey = an0ther_ins1ghts_qu3ry_k3y_h3re
